text: What determines whether a module can show a live preview of changes in the page builder, or whether a user needs to select “Apply changes” for changes to show? I can’t seem to figure out rhyme or reason as to what determines that.
JavaScript. As far as I know that is the only reason.
Oh, wow! Sure enough, that looks to be it — a few of my modules had module.js files in the HubSpot File System, but not on my local environment. Never would’ve thought to check that, thanks a ton! :)
